content: * *Udders** is a Singapore-based [ice cream](/wiki/Ice_cream) parlour franchise, established in 2007. It is owned by David Yim. ## History David Lin and his wife Peck established Udders in 2007 and opened the first store at [United Square](/wiki/Novena,_Singapore). ## Services The company organizes ice-cream making workshops and provides ice-cream catering services. ## Operations The business has expanded to 400 locations across Southeast Asia.[*citation needed*] As of February 2022, Udders has six outlets in Singapore.
title: Udders (ice cream)
